all_fields.name: name
all_fields.documentation: Name of primary holder operating the account

all_fields.name: dob
all_fields.documentation: Date of birth of primary account holder

all_fields.name: mobile
all_fields.documentation: Primary mobile number of account holder

all_fields.name: nominee
all_fields.documentation: Name of nominee associated with the account

all_fields.name: dematId
all_fields.documentation: Demat ID assigned or issued to investor

all_fields.name: address
all_fields.documentation: Address of primary account holder

all_fields.name: email
all_fields.documentation: Email ID of primary account holder

all_fields.name: pan
all_fields.documentation: PAN of account holder

all_fields.name: ckycCompliance
all_fields.documentation: KYC status whether its completed or pending

all_fields.name: folioNo
all_fields.documentation: Unique folio number associated with investment

all_fields.name: investmentValue
all_fields.documentation: Principal or Actual amount of investment

all_fields.name: currentValue
all_fields.documentation: Current value of investment as on date

all_fields.name: amc
all_fields.documentation: Name of asset management company associated with investment

all_fields.name: registrar
all_fields.documentation: Name of registrar linked with investment made

all_fields.name: scheme
all_fields.documentation: Scheme in which investment made whether it direct, regular or growth option

all_fields.name: isin
all_fields.documentation: International Securities Identification Number (ISIN) uniquely identifies a security.

all_fields.name: ucc
all_fields.documentation: Uniform Commercial Code formal or legal code represent investment

all_fields.name: amfiCode
all_fields.documentation: AMFI code associated with investment made

all_fields.name: holdingType
all_fields.documentation: Reinvest, Payout or Growth type of Dividend

all_fields.name: holder1Name
all_fields.documentation: Name of the first holder who made initial investment

all_fields.name: holder2Name
all_fields.documentation: Name of the second holder in case of joint investmet

all_fields.name: units
all_fields.documentation: Units allotted in folio till date

all_fields.name: nav
all_fields.documentation: NAV is current market rate of security held as on date

all_fields.name: value
all_fields.documentation: Current value of investment calculate based on units and NAV

all_fields.name: devidentType
all_fields.documentation: Dividend type - Interim, Final and Special

all_fields.name: amount
all_fields.documentation: Amount invested or to be invested at fixed intervals

all_fields.name: frequency
all_fields.documentation: Frequency of investment whether its monthly, quarterly, yearly

all_fields.name: instalmentDay
all_fields.documentation: Date of installment when amount will deduct in case of SIP

all_fields.name: pendingInstalments
all_fields.documentation: Number of installment pending for the SIP period choosen at initial stage

all_fields.name: completeInstalments
all_fields.documentation: Number of installment alreay processed through SIP mode

all_fields.name: lastInstalmentDate
all_fields.documentation: Date of last installment when it was processed

all_fields.name: nextInstalmentDate
all_fields.documentation: Due date of last installment

all_fields.name: creationDate
all_fields.documentation: SIP creation date

all_fields.name: modificationDate
all_fields.documentation: Modification Date of SIP in terms of SIP date, SIP amount etc

all_fields.name: ceasedDate
all_fields.documentation: Ceased date of SIP

all_fields.name: issueDate
all_fields.documentation: Issue date of investment as per period choosen

all_fields.documentation: Name of primary account holder

all_fields.documentation: date of birth of account holder

all_fields.documentation: Primary mobile number of account holder.

all_fields.documentation: Status of nominee registred with the account.

all_fields.documentation: Landline number of account holder.

all_fields.documentation: Address of account holder.

all_fields.documentation: Email ID of primary account holder.

all_fields.name: pan
all_fields.documentation: PAN number of primary account holder.

all_fields.name: ckycCompliance
all_fields.documentation: KYC status whether its completed or pending

all_fields.name: currentBalance
all_fields.documentation: Available Balance.

all_fields.name: currency
all_fields.documentation: Currency in which transaction taken place.

all_fields.name: exchgeRate
all_fields.documentation: Currency conversion exchange rate for the day.

all_fields.name: balanceDateTime
all_fields.documentation: Date and time stamp for which current balance recorded.

all_fields.name: branch
all_fields.documentation: Location of branch where investment was made

all_fields.name: facility
all_fields.documentation: Additional facility like Overdraft or Sweep In applicable for the given account.

all_fields.name: ifscCode
all_fields.documentation:
IFSC code of the issued bank
            branch

all_fields.name: micrCode
all_fields.documentation:
MICR code is uniquely identifies a bank and a branch participating
            in an ECS.

all_fields.name: openingDate
all_fields.documentation: Opening date of the deposit account

all_fields.name: currentODLimit
all_fields.documentation: The portion of the sanctioned limit that is available to be drawn, as of this point in time

all_fields.name: drawingLimit
all_fields.documentation: Sanctioned limit (overall limit given by the bank, on the OD/CC facility).

all_fields.name: status
all_fields.documentation: An account status with either active or inactive. An inactive account includes the dormant, inactive, or closed account.

all_fields.name: transactionType
all_fields.documentation: The amount invested or to be invested in deposits such as Fixed or Recurring.

all_fields.name: amount
all_fields.documentation: Pending amount

all_fields.name: startDate
all_fields.documentation: Start date of transaction or period for which details are require.

all_fields.name: endDate
all_fields.documentation: End date of transaction or period for which details are require.

all_fields.name: mode
all_fields.documentation: Mode of investment captured whether online/demat or physical form.

all_fields.name: transactionTimestamp
all_fields.documentation: Transaction date time stamp for particular record when transaction taken place

all_fields.name: txnId
all_fields.documentation: Unique id of the transaction

all_fields.name: narration
all_fields.documentation: Nararation is additional details in form of decription of remark associated with investment.

all_fields.name: reference
all_fields.documentation: The cheque or reference no for the given transaction.

all_fields.name: name
all_fields.documentation: Name of primary holder operating the account

all_fields.name: dob
all_fields.documentation: Date of birth of primary account holder

all_fields.name: mobile
all_fields.documentation: Primary mobile number of account holder

all_fields.name: nominee
all_fields.documentation: Name of nominee associated with the account.

all_fields.name: dematId
all_fields.documentation: Demat ID assigned or issued to investor

all_fields.name: landline
all_fields.documentation: Landline number of account holder

all_fields.name: address
all_fields.documentation: Address of account holder

all_fields.name: email
all_fields.documentation: Email ID of primary account holder.

all_fields.name: pan
all_fields.documentation: PAN number of primary account holder.

all_fields.name: ckycCompliance
all_fields.documentation: KYC status whether its completed or pending.

all_fields.name: riderType
all_fields.documentation: Type of Insurance Rider if present. E.g., Accidental death rider, waiver of premium, etc.

all_fields.name: sumAssured
all_fields.documentation: The amount that the insurer agrees to pay on the occurrence of an event. E.g., the guaranteed amount that the beneficiary of the life insurance policy will receive in case of the holder's death.

all_fields.name: tenureYears
all_fields.documentation: The duration in years for which the policy provides insurance coverage

all_fields.name: tenureMonths
all_fields.documentation: The duration in months for which the policy provides insurance coverage.

all_fields.name: policyStartDate
all_fields.documentation: Start date of policy mentioned at the time of issuing.

all_fields.name: policyEndDate
all_fields.documentation: Date of policy when it will get expired.

all_fields.name: premiumAmount
all_fields.documentation: The amount paid periodically to the insurer by theholderfor covering the risk.

all_fields.name: productName
all_fields.documentation: Name of the product hold by investor

all_fields.name: productDescription
all_fields.documentation: Decription of product hold by investor

all_fields.name: policyMaturityDate
all_fields.documentation: Date of maturity for investment .

all_fields.name: premiumFrequency
all_fields.documentation: Frequnecy of premium to be paid whether monthly, quarterly or annually.

all_fields.name: premiumPaymentYears
all_fields.documentation: Number of year till when premium is require to pay.

all_fields.name: premiumPaymentMonths
all_fields.documentation: Number of month till when premium is require to pay.

all_fields.name: nextPremiumDueDate
all_fields.documentation: Due date for next premium of ULIP policy hold

all_fields.name: units
all_fields.documentation: Units allotted in folio till date.

all_fields.name: nav
all_fields.documentation: NAV is current market rate of security held as on date.

all_fields.name: allocationPercentage
all_fields.documentation: Seggragation and Percentage of units alloted in equity, debt and govt. funds

all_fields.name: premiumAllocation
all_fields.documentation: Premium which is paid till date.

all_fields.name: currentValue
all_fields.documentation: Current value of investment as on date.

all_fields.name: startDate
all_fields.documentation: Start date of investment since when it is applicable.

all_fields.name: endDate
all_fields.documentation: End date of investment when tenure get complete .

all_fields.name: txnId
all_fields.documentation: Transaction ID recorded or captured for investment made.

all_fields.name: txnDate
all_fields.documentation: Transaction date time stamp for particular record when investment taken place

all_fields.name: fundName
all_fields.documentation: Name of fund in which investment is made

all_fields.name: navDate
all_fields.documentation: NAV is current market rate of security held as on date

all_fields.name: premiumAllocationCharge
all_fields.documentation: Premium charges applied on the allocation of fund

all_fields.name: otherCharges
all_fields.documentation: Other charge applied on the investment if applicable

all_fields.name: narration
all_fields.documentation: Nararation is additional details in form of decription of remark associated with investment.

all_fields.name: name
all_fields.documentation: Name of primary holder operating the account.

all_fields.name: dob
all_fields.documentation: Date of birth of primary account holder

all_fields.name: mobile
all_fields.documentation: Primary mobile number of account holder

all_fields.name: nominee
all_fields.documentation: Name of nominee associated with the account.

all_fields.name: dematId
all_fields.documentation: Demat ID assigned or issued to investor

all_fields.name: landline
all_fields.documentation: Landline number of account holder.

all_fields.name: address
all_fields.documentation: Address of account holder.

all_fields.name: email
all_fields.documentation: Email ID of primary account holder.

all_fields.name: pan
all_fields.documentation: PAN number of primary account holder

all_fields.name: ckycCompliance
all_fields.documentation: KYC status whether its completed or pending.

all_fields.name: investmentValue
all_fields.documentation: Principal or Actual amount of investment.

all_fields.name: currentValue
all_fields.documentation: Current value of investment as on date.

all_fields.name: amc
all_fields.documentation: Name of asset management company associated with investment

all_fields.name: registrar
all_fields.documentation: Trust or institution registering and maintaining the detailed records of the transactions of investors for the convenience of mutual fund houses. E.g. CAMS/KARVY

all_fields.name: schemeCode
all_fields.documentation: Code of scheme choosen by person for the investment

all_fields.name: isin
all_fields.documentation: International Securities Identification Number (ISIN) uniquely identifies a security.

all_fields.name: ucc
all_fields.documentation: Unique Client Code generated by Stock Exchanges.

all_fields.name: amfiCode
all_fields.documentation: AMFI code associated with investment made.

all_fields.name: folioNo
all_fields.documentation: Unique folio number associated with investment.

all_fields.name: dividendType
all_fields.documentation: May be Cash, Stock, Property, Scrip or Liquidating.

all_fields.name: FatcaStatus
all_fields.documentation: Whether the Mutual Fund is FATCA (Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act) compliant - Yes/No.

all_fields.name: mode
all_fields.documentation: Mode of investment whether it one time or SIP.

all_fields.name: units
all_fields.documentation: Units allotted in folio till date

all_fields.name: lienUnits
all_fields.documentation: The number of units which have been marked as Lien (Mutual fund units pledged against some borrowed amount).

all_fields.name: rate
all_fields.documentation:
Rate at which it was bought, in case of multiple transaction, the rate
            will be the average buy price

all_fields.name: nav
all_fields.documentation: NAV is current market rate of security held as on date

all_fields.name: lockingUnits
all_fields.documentation: Units which are locked and not available for sale

all_fields.name: startDate
all_fields.documentation: Start date of investment since when it is applicable

all_fields.name: endDate
all_fields.documentation: End date of investment when tenure get complete

all_fields.name: txnId
all_fields.documentation: Transaction ID recorded or captured for investment made.

all_fields.name: schemePlan
all_fields.documentation:
It defines the options to buy the same mutual fund scheme, run by the
            same fund managers who invest in the same stocks and bonds.

all_fields.name: fundType
all_fields.documentation: The type of mutual fund. May be money market funds, fixed income funds, equity funds, balanced funds, index funds or real estate funds.

all_fields.name: schemeTypes
all_fields.documentation:
Please refer:
            https://www.sebi.gov.in/legal/circulars/oct-2017/categorization-and-rationalization-of-mutual-fund-schemes_36199.html

all_fields.name: schemeCategory
all_fields.documentation:
Please refer:
            https://www.sebi.gov.in/legal/circulars/oct-2017/categorization-and-rationalization-of-mutual-fund-schemes_36199.html

all_fields.name: amount
all_fields.documentation: The transaction amount.

all_fields.name: navDate
all_fields.documentation: NAV is current market rate of security held as on date.

all_fields.name: orderDate
all_fields.documentation: Date when order is placed for investment.

all_fields.name: executionDate
all_fields.documentation: Date when order is executed.

all_fields.name: lock-inFlag
all_fields.documentation: Flag which identify units which are locked and not available for sale.

all_fields.name: lock-inDays
all_fields.documentation: Units which are locked and not available for sale.

all_fields.name: narration
all_fields.documentation: Nararation is additional details in form of decription of remark associated with investment.

all_fields.documentation: PAN number of primary account holder

all_fields.documentation: Date of birth of primary account holder

all_fields.documentation: Name of nominee associated with the account

all_fields.documentation: Email id  of primary account holder

all_fields.documentation: Mobile number of primary account holder

all_fields.documentation: KYC status whether its completed or pending.

all_fields.documentation: Principal or Actual amount of investment.

all_fields.documentation: Current value of investment as on date.

all_fields.documentation: Unique folio number associated with investment.

all_fields.documentation: Name of scheme choosen by person for the investment.

all_fields.documentation: DP ID of investor alloted at the time investment for further transaction.

all_fields.documentation: Units allotted in folio till date

all_fields.documentation: International Securities Identification Number (ISIN) uniquely identifies a security.

all_fields.name: mode
all_fields.documentation: Mode of investment whether it one time or SIP

all_fields.name: rate
all_fields.documentation: Rate or net price on which investment made in security

all_fields.name: nav
all_fields.documentation: NAV is current market rate of security held as on date

all_fields.name: lastNavDate
all_fields.documentation: Closing Price Date or last nav date on which security trade in the open market.

all_fields.name: symbol
all_fields.documentation: Symbol of the securities in which investment made and hold by investor.

all_fields.name: description
all_fields.documentation: Description or details of security in which investment made.

all_fields.documentation: Start date of investment since when it is applicable

all_fields.name: endDate
all_fields.documentation: End date of investment when tenure get complete

all_fields.documentation: Transaction ID recorded or captured for investment made

all_fields.documentation: Transaction date time stamp for particular record when investment taken place.

all_fields.documentation: The transaction amount.

all_fields.documentation: Minimum lot size refers to the number of shares you buy in one transaction for the given ETF scheme.

all_fields.name: name
all_fields.documentation: Name of primary holder operating the account

all_fields.name: dob
all_fields.documentation: Date of birth of primary account holder

all_fields.name: mobile
all_fields.documentation: Primary mobile number of account holder

all_fields.name: landline
all_fields.documentation: Landline number of account holder

all_fields.name: address
all_fields.documentation: Address of account holder

all_fields.name: email
all_fields.documentation: Email ID of primary account holder

all_fields.name: pan
all_fields.documentation: PAN number of primary account holder

all_fields.name: ckycCompliance
all_fields.documentation: KYC status whether its completed or pending

all_fields.name: nominee
all_fields.documentation: Name of nominee associated with the account

all_fields.name: riderType
all_fields.documentation: Type of Insurance Rider if present. E.g., Accidental death rider, waiver of premium, etc.

all_fields.name: sumAssured
all_fields.documentation: The amount that the insurer agrees to pay on the occurrence of an event. E.g., the guaranteed amount that the beneficiary of the life insurance policy will receive in case of the holder's death.

all_fields.name: tenureYears
all_fields.documentation: The duration in years for which the policy provides insurance coverage.

all_fields.name: tenureMonths
all_fields.documentation: The duration in months for which the policy provides insurance coverage

all_fields.name: premiumAmount
all_fields.documentation: The amount paid periodically to the insurer by theholderfor covering the risk.

all_fields.name: policyStartDate
all_fields.documentation: Start date of policy mentioned at the time of issuing

all_fields.name: policyEndDate
all_fields.documentation: Date of policy when it will get expired.

all_fields.name: policyName
all_fields.documentation: Name of policy which is purchased

all_fields.name: policyNumber
all_fields.documentation: Policy Number alloted or assigned

all_fields.name: eiaNumber
all_fields.documentation: e-InsuranceAccount or ElectronicInsuranceAccount number

all_fields.name: policyDescription
all_fields.documentation: Description of policy

all_fields.name: coverAmount
all_fields.documentation: Amount or value of cover in insurance

all_fields.name: policyType
all_fields.documentation: The specific type of Insurance Life, Motor or Health Insurance. E.g Child's Plan

all_fields.name: coverType
all_fields.documentation: The specific risk types covered by the Insurance. E.g., Home insurance might cover Home Structure/ Building or Burglary/Theft, etc.

all_fields.name: premiumFrequency
all_fields.documentation: Frequnecy of premium to be paid whether monthly, quarterly or annually

all_fields.name: premiumPaymentYears
all_fields.documentation: Number of year till when premium is require to pay.

all_fields.name: premiumPaymentMonths
all_fields.documentation: Number of month till when premium is require to pay

all_fields.name: maturityDate
all_fields.documentation: Date of maturity for investment

all_fields.name: maturityBenefit
all_fields.documentation: The lump-sum amount theinsurancecompany pay the holder after thematurityofinsurancepolicy.

all_fields.name: date
all_fields.documentation: Start date of policy

all_fields.name: description
all_fields.documentation: Description or details of security in which investment made

all_fields.name: title
all_fields.documentation: In case of Title insurance whether it is Lender's or Owner's Title insurance

all_fields.name: subLimit
all_fields.documentation: The amount ofcoverageavailable to cover a specific type of loss

all_fields.name: conditions
all_fields.documentation: The specific provisions, rules of conduct, duties, and obligations that theholder must comply with in order to keepcoveragein effect. If these conditionsare not met, the insurer can deny the claim.

all_fields.name: exlcusions
all_fields.documentation: The risk(s) excludedfrom the insurance policycoverage

all_fields.name: startDate
all_fields.documentation: Start date of investment since when it is applicable

all_fields.name: endDate
all_fields.documentation: End date of investment when tenure get complete

all_fields.name: txnId
all_fields.documentation: Transaction ID recorded or captured for investment made

all_fields.name: txnDate
all_fields.documentation: Transaction date time stamp for particular record when investment taken place

all_fields.name: narration
all_fields.documentation: Nararation is additional details in form of decription of remark associated with investment

all_fields.name: name
all_fields.documentation: Name of primary holder operating the account

all_fields.name: dob
all_fields.documentation: Date of birth of primary account holder

all_fields.name: mobile
all_fields.documentation: Primary mobile number of account holder

all_fields.name: nominee
all_fields.documentation: Name of nominee associated with the account

all_fields.name: dematId
all_fields.documentation: Demat ID assigned or issued to investor

all_fields.name: landline
all_fields.documentation: Landline of primary account holder

all_fields.name: address
all_fields.documentation: Address of primary account holder

all_fields.name: email
all_fields.documentation: Email ID of primary account holder

all_fields.name: pan
all_fields.documentation: PAN number of primary account holder

all_fields.name: ckycCompliance
all_fields.documentation: KYC status whether its completed or pending

all_fields.name: investmentValue
all_fields.documentation: Principal or Actual amount of investment

all_fields.name: currentValue
all_fields.documentation: Current value of investment as on date

all_fields.name: issuerName
all_fields.documentation: Name of party who issued the equities in which investment made

all_fields.name: isin
all_fields.documentation: International Securities Identification Number (ISIN) uniquely identifies a security.

all_fields.name: units
all_fields.documentation: Units allotted in folio till date

all_fields.name: investmentDateTime
all_fields.documentation: Date and Time stamp for the investment

all_fields.name: rate
all_fields.documentation:
rate: Rate at which the stock was bought, in case of multiple
            transactions, the rate will be the average buy price

all_fields.name: lastTradedPrice
all_fields.documentation: Last trade price of security or closing price

all_fields.name: description
all_fields.documentation: Description or details of security in which investment made.

all_fields.name: startDate
all_fields.documentation: Start date of investment since when it is applicable

all_fields.name: endDate
all_fields.documentation: End date of investment when tenure get complete

all_fields.name: txnId
all_fields.documentation: Transaction ID recorded or captured for investment made

all_fields.name: orderId
all_fields.documentation: Order ID which generated at the time of placing the order

all_fields.name: companyName
all_fields.documentation: Name of company is which investment made

all_fields.name: symbol
all_fields.documentation: Symbol of the securities in which investment made and hold by investor

all_fields.name: transactionDateTime
all_fields.documentation: Transaction date time stamp for particular record when investment taken place

all_fields.name: exchange
all_fields.documentation: Stock Exchange on which security is traded

all_fields.name: strikePrice
all_fields.documentation:
The strike price is defined as the price at which the holder of an
            options can buy (in the case of a call option) or sell (in the case of a put option) the
            underlying security when the option is exercised. This will be applicable in case of
            Options only

all_fields.name: narration
all_fields.documentation: Nararation is additional details in form of decription of remark associated with investment

all_fields.name: totalCharge
all_fields.documentation: Total charges includes finance charge, STT or other taxes/charge implied on investment

all_fields.name: tradeValue
all_fields.documentation: Trade value of investment as per market price

all_fields.name: shareHolderEquityType
all_fields.documentation: The amount of money to be returned to the company's shareholders if all of the company's assets were liquidated and all of the company's debt was paid off.

all_fields.name: otherCharges
all_fields.documentation: Other charge applied on the investment if applicable

            underlying security when the option is exercised. This will be applicable in case of
            Options only

all_fields.name: issuerName
all_fields.documentation: Name of the issuer.

all_fields.name: typeOfSecurity
all_fields.documentation: Type of Security held.

all_fields.name: valuationMethodology
all_fields.documentation:
This data point shall specify what is the methodology used for valuation
            of the particular asset. E.g. for listed equity, the value might be based on market
            price.

all_fields.name: lastValuationDate
all_fields.documentation: Last date on which valuation of the asset was performed.

all_fields.name: mtmOnLastValuation
all_fields.documentation:
Mark to Market on last valuation is used to determine the market value
            of investments in those securities on last valuation date.

all_fields.name: name
all_fields.documentation: Name of primary holder operating the account.

all_fields.name: dob
all_fields.documentation: Date of birth of primary account holder.

all_fields.name: mobile
all_fields.documentation: Primary mobile number of account holder.

all_fields.name: nominee
all_fields.documentation: Name of nominee associated with the account.

all_fields.name: landline
all_fields.documentation: Landline of primary account holder.

all_fields.name: address
all_fields.documentation: Address of primary account holder

all_fields.name: email
all_fields.documentation: Email ID of primary account holder

all_fields.name: pan
all_fields.documentation: PAN number of primary account holder

all_fields.name: ckycCompliance
all_fields.documentation: KYC status whether its completed or pending

all_fields.name: branch
all_fields.documentation: Name of the brach

all_fields.name: openingDate
all_fields.documentation: Opening date of the deposit account

all_fields.name: ifsc
all_fields.documentation: IFSC code of bank branch where investment was made

all_fields.name: accountType
all_fields.documentation: Type of account - fixed in this case

all_fields.name: maturityAmount
all_fields.documentation: Amount which will be received on maturity

all_fields.name: maturityDate
all_fields.documentation: Amount which will be received on maturity date

all_fields.name: description
all_fields.documentation: Description or details of security in which investment made

all_fields.name: interestPayout
all_fields.documentation: Amount of interest which is paid to investor till date

all_fields.name: interestRate
all_fields.documentation: Rate of interest which decided amount of maturity

all_fields.name: principalAmount
all_fields.documentation: Amount which is investment in the security

all_fields.name: tenureDays
all_fields.documentation: Days which are passed since investment made

all_fields.name: tenureMonths
all_fields.documentation: Months which are passed since investment made

all_fields.name: tenureYears
all_fields.documentation: Years which are passed since investment made

all_fields.name: interestComputation
all_fields.documentation: Whether interest is to be Compound or Simple

all_fields.name: compoundingFrequency
all_fields.documentation: Frequency at which interest is compounded - monthly/quarterly/annually

all_fields.name: interestPeriodicPayoutAmount
all_fields.documentation: The amount of interest paid out based on compounding frequency

all_fields.name: interestOnMaturity
all_fields.documentation: Interest amount received on date of maturity

all_fields.name: currentValue
all_fields.documentation: Current value of investment as on date

all_fields.name: startDate
all_fields.documentation: Start date of transaction or period for which details are require

all_fields.name: endDate
all_fields.documentation: End date of transaction or period for which details are require

all_fields.name: txnId
all_fields.documentation: Transaction ID recorded or captured for investment made

all_fields.name: amount
all_fields.documentation: Amount deposited for the specified term.

all_fields.name: narration
all_fields.documentation: Nararation is additional details in form of decription of remark associated with investment.

all_fields.name: mode
all_fields.documentation: Mode of investment captured whether online/demat or physical form.

all_fields.name: balance
all_fields.documentation: Current value of investment

all_fields.name: transactionDateTime
all_fields.documentation: Transaction date time stamp for particular record when investment taken place.

all_fields.name: valueDate
all_fields.documentation: Date when the transaction actually carries out. For example., cheque realization.

all_fields.name: reference
all_fields.documentation: The cheque or reference no for the given transaction.
